properties.description: Read data from Omakotitalohinnat -file and load the data to SQL table.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Aluejako as string,
		{2015 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(20,2),
		{2015 Keskipinta-ala m2} as decimal(20,2),
		{2015 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2016 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(20,2),
		{2016 Keskipinta-ala m2} as decimal(20,2),
		{2016 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2017 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(20,2),
		{2017 Keskipinta-ala m2} as decimal(20,2),
		{2017 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2018 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(20,2),
		{2018 Keskipinta-ala m2} as decimal(20,2),
		{2018 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Omakotitalohinnat2015
Omakotitalohinnat2015 select() ~> Select4
Select4 sink(input(
		Aluejako as string,
		Neliohinta_2015 as decimal(20,2),
		Keskipinta_ala_2015 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2016 as decimal(20,2),
		Keskipinta_ala_2016 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2017 as decimal(20,2),
		Keskipinta_ala_2017 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2018 as decimal(20,2),
		Keskipinta_ala_2018 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		Aluejako,
		Neliohinta_2015 = {2015 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Keskipinta_ala_2015 = {2015 Keskipinta-ala m2},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 = {2015 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2016 = {2016 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Keskipinta_ala_2016 = {2016 Keskipinta-ala m2},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 = {2016 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2017 = {2017 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Keskipinta_ala_2017 = {2017 Keskipinta-ala m2},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 = {2017 Keskipinta-ala m2},
		Neliohinta_2018 = {2018 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Keskipinta_ala_2018 = {2018 Keskipinta-ala m2},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 = {2018 Kauppojen lukumaara}
	)) ~> sink1

properties.description: Read osakeasunto data from two files and join them together. Source files separated as they did not fit into one from Tilastokeskus. DerivedColumn2 has derivation for Postinumero, Alue and Kaupunki using Data Factory functions.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Postinumero as string,
		Talotyyppi as string,
		Rakennusvuosi as string,
		{2015 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(10,0),
		{2015 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2016 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(10,0),
		{2016 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2017 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(10,0),
		{2017 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2018 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(10,0),
		{2018 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Osakeaasuntohinnat2015
source(output(
		Postinumero as string,
		Talotyyppi as string,
		Rakennusvuosi as string,
		{2010 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as short,
		{2010 Kauppojen lukumaara} as short,
		{2011 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as short,
		{2011 Kauppojen lukumaara} as short,
		{2012 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as short,
		{2012 Kauppojen lukumaara} as short,
		{2013 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as short,
		{2013 Kauppojen lukumaara} as short,
		{2014 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as short,
		{2014 Kauppojen lukumaara} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Osakeasuntohinnat2010
Osakeaasuntohinnat2015 select(mapColumn(
		Postinumero,
		Talotyyppi,
		Rakennusvuosi,
		{2015 Neliohinta} = {2015 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		{2015 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		{2016 Neliohinta} = {2016 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		{2016 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		{2017 Neliohinta} = {2017 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		{2017 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		{2018 Neliohinta} = {2018 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		{2018 Kauppojen lukumaara}
	)) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(Postinumero = substring(Postinumero, 1, 5),
		Alue = trim(substring(Postinumero, instr(Postinumero, ' '), instr(Postinumero, '(') - instr(Postinumero, ' '))),
		Kaupunki = trim(substring(Postinumero, instr(Postinumero, '('), 50),' ())')) ~> DerivedColumn2
Osakeasuntohinnat2010 select() ~> Select3
DerivedColumn2, Select3 join(DerivedColumn2@Postinumero == substring(Select3@Postinumero, 1, 5)
	&& Select2@Talotyyppi == Select3@Talotyyppi
	&& Select2@Rakennusvuosi == Select3@Rakennusvuosi,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Postinumero = DerivedColumn2@Postinumero,
		Alue,
		Kaupunki,
		Talotyyppi = Select2@Talotyyppi,
		Rakennusvuosi = Select2@Rakennusvuosi,
		Neliohinta_2015 = {2015 Neliohinta},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 = {2015 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2016 = {2016 Neliohinta},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 = {2016 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2017 = {2017 Neliohinta},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 = {2017 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2018 = {2018 Neliohinta},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 = {2018 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2010 = {2010 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2010 = {2010 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2011 = {2011 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2011 = {2011 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2012 = {2012 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2012 = {2012 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2013 = {2013 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2013 = {2013 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2014 = {2014 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2014 = {2014 Kauppojen lukumaara}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select7 sink(input(
		Postinumero as string,
		Alue as string,
		Kaupunki as string,
		Talotyyppi as string,
		Rakennusvuosi as string,
		Neliohinta_2010 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2010 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2011 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2011 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2012 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2012 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2013 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2013 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2014 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2014 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2015 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2016 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2017 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2018 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	keys:['Postinumero','Talotyyppi','Rakennusvuosi']) ~> sink4
Select7 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink6

source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		Column_24 as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		Column_26 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7,
		Column_8,
		Column_9,
		Column_10,
		Column_11,
		Column_12,
		Column_13,
		Column_14,
		Column_15,
		Column_16,
		Column_17,
		Column_18,
		Column_19,
		Column_20,
		Column_21,
		Column_22,
		Column_23,
		Column_24,
		Column_25,
		Column_26
	)) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		Lapsen_koko_nimi as string,
		{Ikä} as string,
		{Syntymäaika} as string,
		Lapsen_koko_nimi2 as string,
		{Ikä2} as string,
		{Syntymäaika2} as string,
		Varausnumero as string,
		Laiva1 as string,
		{Lähtöpäivä1} as string,
		{Mistä1} as string,
		Mihin1 as string,
		Laiva2 as string,
		{Lähtöpäivä2} as string,
		{Mistä2} as string,
		Mihin2 as string,
		Laiva3 as string,
		{Lähtöpäivä3} as string,
		{Mistä3} as string,
		Mihin3 as string,
		Huoltajan_nimi as string,
		Postiosoite as string,
		Puhelinnumero as string,
		Valtuutetun_nimi2 as string,
		Postiosoite2 as string,
		Puhelinnumero2 as string,
		{Paikka_ja_päivämäärä} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	mapColumn(
		Lapsen_koko_nimi = Column_1,
		{Ikä} = Column_2,
		{Syntymäaika} = Column_3,
		Lapsen_koko_nimi2 = Column_4,
		{Ikä2} = Column_5,
		{Syntymäaika2} = Column_6,
		Varausnumero = Column_7,
		Laiva1 = Column_8,
		{Lähtöpäivä1} = Column_9,
		{Mistä1} = Column_10,
		Mihin1 = Column_11,
		Laiva2 = Column_12,
		{Lähtöpäivä2} = Column_13,
		{Mistä2} = Column_14,
		Mihin2 = Column_15,
		Laiva3 = Column_16,
		{Lähtöpäivä3} = Column_17,
		{Mistä3} = Column_18,
		Mihin3 = Column_19,
		Huoltajan_nimi = Column_20,
		Postiosoite = Column_21,
		Puhelinnumero = Column_22,
		Valtuutetun_nimi2 = Column_23,
		Postiosoite2 = Column_24,
		Puhelinnumero2 = Column_25,
		{Paikka_ja_päivämäärä} = Column_26
	)) ~> sink1

properties.description: Read data from Vuokra file, derive Vuosi -column and load the data to SQL table.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Vuosineljannes as string,
		Alue as string,
		Huoneluku as string,
		Rahoitusmuoto as string,
		Lukumaara as string,
		Neliovuokra as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	dateFormats: ['dd/MM/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'float') ~> Vuokrahinnat2015
Vuokrahinnat2015 select() ~> Select1
Select1 derive(Vuosi = toInteger(substring(Vuosineljannes, 1, 4))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Vuosineljannes as string,
		Alue as string,
		Huoneluku as string,
		Rahoitusmuoto as string,
		Lukumaara as string,
		Neliovuokra as string,
		Vuosi as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	mapColumn(
		Vuosineljannes,
		Alue,
		Huoneluku,
		Rahoitusmuoto,
		Lukumaara,
		Neliovuokra,
		Vuosi
	)) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Vuosineljannes as string,
		Vuosi as string,
		Alue as string,
		Huoneluku as string,
		Rahoitusmuoto as string,
		Lukumaara as string,
		Neliovuokra as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['vuokra_curated'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2

properties.description: Starts the Copy Data action and after that starts each of the 5 separate pipelines.

activities.name: Copy
activities.description: Copies all .csv files from Jaakko's folder to Aureolissdsdatalake.
